    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseHandler

        public DatabaseHandler(java.lang.String username)
        Creates an instance of type DatabaseHandler. Takes a String representing a logged in user. Certain commands can only be perfomed on the logged in user, for security reasons.
        Parameters:
        username - The username (as a string) that represents the logged in user.

    • Method Detail

      • setDatabasesDirectory

        public static void setDatabasesDirectory(java.lang.String directory)
        Sets the database directory string that will be added to database names. The format of this string is Unix directory traversal from the root of the program's executing folder. Therefore, a folder stored inside that root folder would be passed in the form ".//"
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory that the databases will be stored in. Represented by standard Unix directory movement. Default is "."

      • getAllUsers

        public static java.lang.String[] getAllUsers()
        Returns:
        A string array of all users that exist in the system.

      • doesUsernameExist

        public static java.lang.Boolean doesUsernameExist(java.lang.String Username)
        Parameters:
        Username - The username to check the existence of, as a string.
        Returns:
        A boolean value of 1 (Exists) or 0 (Does not exist).

      • getFollowRequests

        public java.lang.String[] getFollowRequests()
        Returns:
        A string array representing all users that have requested to follow the logged in user (passed in constructor).

      • getFollowers

        public java.lang.String[] getFollowers()
        Returns:
        A string array representing all users that are currently following the logged in user.

      • getFollowedUsers

        public java.lang.String[] getFollowedUsers()
        Returns:
        A string array representing the users that the logged in user is following.

      • acceptFollowerRequests

        public void acceptFollowerRequests(java.lang.String[] usernames)
        Parameters:
        usernames - A string array of all the users to grant a follower relationship to.

      • denyFollowerRequests

        public void denyFollowerRequests(java.lang.String[] usernames)
        Parameters:
        usernames - A string array of all the users to deny a follower relationship to.

      • requestFollow

        public void requestFollow(java.lang.String username)
        Parameters:
        username - Causes the connected user to request a follower relationship with the user designated by username.

      • stopFollow

        public void stopFollow(java.lang.String username)
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user to stop following. Does nothing if user is not already being followed.

      • makeNewPost

        public void makeNewPost(java.lang.String postContent,
               boolean isLink)
        Parameters:
        postContent - The content of the post, as a string.
        isLink - True if the post is to be styled as an HTML link, false otherwise.

      • makeNewPost

               java.lang.String[] followers,
               boolean isLink)
        Parameters:
        postContent - tThe content of the post, as a string.
        followers - An array of usernames to send this post to.
        isLink - True if the post is to be styled as an HTML link, false otherwise.

      • getAllPosts

        public java.util.ArrayList<DatabaseHandler.PostDetails> getAllPosts()
        Returns:
        An array of PostDetails of all the posts visible by the connectedUser

      • getAllPosts

        public java.util.ArrayList<DatabaseHandler.PostDetails> getAllPosts(java.lang.String username)
        Parameters:
        username - The username to scan for posts.
        Returns:
        All posts that have been made by the passed in user.
